alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Walker (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 29 at 6:09PM CST until November 29 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Walker County in central Alabama... Northern Fayette County in west central Alabama... * Until 700 PM CST. * At 609 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fayette, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Winfield, Fayette, Carbon Hill, Glen Allen, Kansas, Belk, Eldridge, Bluff, Bazemore, Richard Arthur Field, Bevill State College Fayette, Hubbertville, Cedrum Area, Fowlers Crossroads, Holly Grove and Townley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for central and west central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
